text: Sport Clube Santo Antônio, commonly known as Sport Atalaia or simply as Sport, is a Brazilian football club based in Atalaia, Alagoas state. ==History== The club was founded on July 13, 2007. They finished as runners-up in the 2010 Campeonato Alagoano Second Level, losing the competition to CSA. ==Stadium== Sport Clube Santo Antônio play their home games at Estádio Luís de Albuquerque Pontes. The stadium has a maximum capacity of 3,000 people. ==References== Category:Association football clubs established in 2007 Category:Football clubs in Alagoas Category:2007 establishments in Brazil
title: Sport Clube Santo Antônio
